bio:
Irnskar Ironhand, a Nord man, lives in Solitude. He serves as the housecarl of Thane Bryling, an important member of Jarl Elisif’s court at the Blue Palace.
Irnskar has white hair and a thick beard. He wears a set of iron armor.
Irnskar guards and maintains Bryling’s house in Solitude. He can often by seen conversing with Bryling, discussing subjects such as the Civil War between the Imperial Legion and the Stormcloaks, and administrative matters (such as rent and tax collection).
Octieve San, an elderly Breton man, owes Irnskar a substantial of money from gambling debt.
If Bryling dies, Irnskar will temporarily serve as a Thane in her place until a more suitable replacement is found.
Quotes:
"Unless we have specific business, I'm not interested."
"When I was a young rascal, I broke a man's arm with a single punch. Course, I had a horseshoe hidden in my glove..."
"I think Bryling's the one you want to talk to. I'm mostly just here to scare away the riff raff".
name: Irnskar Ironhand
